full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
BPM022572: Request for Proposal for Dell Server Support and Maintenance

## Reference Number
SSC-24-00028330:T

## Solicitation Number
BPM022572/28330

## Tender Details
* **Opening Date**: 2024-11-15
* **Closing Date**: 2024-11-27T14:00:00
* **Tender Status**: Open
* **GSAIN Code**: JX7025, N7021
* **GSAIN Description**: ADP Input-Output and Storage Devices - Maintenance; Central Processing Unit (CPU) Digital

## Tenders Categories
This tender falls under the category Government of Canada [GD] Service Ready Vendor Test: Government of Canada-Centralized (SRVTGD)

## Request for Proposal
Bidder must be capable of providing Dell Server Support and Maintenance (or equivalent) for a contractual period of one year.

## Tender Requirements
Bidder must be able to provide maintenance support and repair services for Dell servers to Customers across Canada, particularly in Ontario and the National Capital Region. Customer locations will be negotiated post-award.

## Evaluation Criteria
Bidder responses will be evaluated based on:

* Response to tender requirements (40%)
* Technical capabilities (30%)
* Price (20%)
* Past performance (10%)

## Proposal Submission
All quotations must be submitted through the Government of Canada's online tendering system (P2P portal) at https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/.

## Registering to Submit Bids
To register with SSC P2P portal please click the "Register Now" button on the home page. Once registered, you will have access to view and submit solicitations from SSC, track your submissions, receive updates, and be awarded contracts and amendments.

## Mandatory Submission
All bidders must attempt to submit their bids through the P2P portal. Submissions not permitted after Solicitation Closing.

## Contact Information:
For more information, please contact:
* Name: Sandra Ladouceur
* Phone: 613-302-0766
* Fax: 613-960-6026
* Email address: None
* Postal Address:
	+ Street Address: 90, rue Metcalfe
	+ City: Ottawa
	+ Province: Ontario
	+ Country: Canada

## Publication Documents:
Access to publication documents can be found by following the link to the SSC P2P portal above.
